dm:bugtracker.dm:product: SAP HANA System Replication Scale-Out High Availability in Amazon Web Services SLES12

productname: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications

abstract.para: SUSEÂ® Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications is optimized in various ways for SAP* applications. This guide provides detailed information about how to install and customize SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications for SAP HANA Scale-Out system replication with automated failover in the Amazon Web Services Cloud.
This document is based on SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP4. The concept however can also be used with newer versions.
